Registers an event for a callback or wait notification from the current DOM. Registrations last the lifetime of the DOM document to which they apply, all registrations made with RegisterEvent are removed when [Gecko.LoadData LoadData] or [Gecko.LoadURI LoadURI] is called. The function returns true on success and false on failure. 

==Parameters==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| Target || [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] || The DOM node that is the target of the event ||
|| Event || String || The event to be registered ||
|| Callback || String || The name of the function to be called if the event fires ||
